post:
Free post2host [p2h] http://www.nationserver.info



Requirements to get a VPS:
20 posts 
0 or a positive reputation
0% warning level

To keep the VPS you must:
make at least 20 posts per month.
Show proof of using your VPS
Keep your warning level below 50%

VPS INFO: http://www.nationserver.info/info.php
